Class HotelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • HotelManager

  • public class HotelManager
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HotelManager()
      Constructor for HotelManager.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBooking(java.lang.String parameters)
      Checks which hotel can accommodate the specified booking (if any) and delegates the task of adding the booking to that hotel.
      void addHotelAndRoom(java.lang.String parameters)
      Adds the specified hotel to the list of hotels and delegates the task of adding the room to that hotel.
      void cancelBooking(java.lang.String parameters)
      Delegates the process of checking if a cancellation is valid, as well as the cancellation itself (if it is valid) to the specified hotel.
      void changeBooking(java.lang.String parameters)
      Checks if the requested change is valid, and if so, delegates the responsibility of removing the old booking to the corresponding hotel and the responsibility of adding the new booking to the first hotel that can accommodate it.
      void printHotelBookings(java.lang.String hotelName)
      Prints out all of the specified hotel's bookings in the order of room name and then start date.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • HotelManager

        public HotelManager()
        Constructor for HotelManager. Initialises a list of hotels.

    • Method Detail

      • addHotelAndRoom

        public void addHotelAndRoom(java.lang.String parameters)
        Adds the specified hotel to the list of hotels and delegates the task of adding the room to that hotel. If hotel is unknown to the system, it is added.
        Parameters:
        parameters - String detailing the hotel/room name and room type.

      • addBooking

        public void addBooking(java.lang.String parameters)
        Checks which hotel can accommodate the specified booking (if any) and delegates the task of adding the booking to that hotel.
        Parameters:
        parameters - String detailing the requested booking.

      • changeBooking

        public void changeBooking(java.lang.String parameters)
        Checks if the requested change is valid, and if so, delegates the responsibility of removing the old booking to the corresponding hotel and the responsibility of adding the new booking to the first hotel that can accommodate it.
        Parameters:
        parameters - String detailing the previous booking and the desired new booking.

      • cancelBooking

        public void cancelBooking(java.lang.String parameters)
        Delegates the process of checking if a cancellation is valid, as well as the cancellation itself (if it is valid) to the specified hotel.
        Parameters:
        parameters - String detailing the cancellation.

      • printHotelBookings

        public void printHotelBookings(java.lang.String hotelName)
        Prints out all of the specified hotel's bookings in the order of room name and then start date.
        Parameters:
        hotelName - String containing the name of the desired hotel.
